title: Manga Grimm Douwa: Yoshiwara Densetsu
original_name: まんがグリム 吉原伝説
sinopse:
Volume 1

1. Yoshiwara Yuukaku
2. Amefuri Otsuki-san
3. Hanayome Ningyou
4. Maleen-hime
5. Gachouban no Musume
   Included one-shots: Rouningyou Yashiki, Rapunzel

Volume 2 6. Sakurahime Azuma Bunshou 7. Shiroi Hebi 8. Senbikigawa 9. Sarukani Gassen 10. Kin no Tamago 11. Yowanasake Ukina no Yokogushi (Kirare Yosa)
Included one-shot: Bijo to Yajuu (Beauty and the Beast)
